page.title: 03TRELLECH SCHOOL FACILITIES.
page.content: THERE ARE 33 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL, 2 TEACHERS, A NURSERY ASSISTANT, A SECRETARY, 3 COOKS, AND 1 CARETAKER. THE SCHOOL IS DATED 1820 AND THERE IS ONE ROOM. IT IS HEATED WITH A GAS HEATER AND AN OPEN FIRE. THE FOOD IS COOKED IN THE CANTEEN AND IS EATEN IN THE CLASSROOM. WE DO P.E. AND CONCERTS IN THE CHURCH HALL. THE TOILETS ARE OUTSIDE. ON THE FOOTBALL PITCH THERE ARE TWO TREES. OUR HEADTEACHER'S OFFICE IS UPSTAIRS. IT IS A NARROW STAIRCASE AND VERY WINDEY. THE AGE RANGE IS 4 TO 11. THE JUNIORS AND INFANTS ARE SEPARATED BY A SCREEN. I COME TO SCHOOL IN A TAXI, SOME COME IN PARENT'S CARS AND SOME WALK. IT IS DUE TO CLOSE IN TWO YEARS.
